mapper.sql: ID, SYS_ITEM_ID, PAY_TYPE, UNIT_TYPE, COST, UNIT, IS_TARGET, PAY_GROUP, MULTI_TYPE, LEVEL, VIP_LEVEL, TEAM_LEVEL, WEIGHT_RATE, PROBABILITY, IS_DELETED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME

pri.ID, pri.SYS_ITEM_ID, pri.PAY_TYPE, pri.UNIT_TYPE, pri.COST, pri.UNIT, pri.IS_TARGET, pri.PAY_GROUP, pri.MULTI_TYPE, pri.LEVEL, pri.VIP_LEVEL, pri.TEAM_LEVEL, pri.WEIGHT_RATE, pri.PROBABILITY, pri.IS_DELETED, pri.CREATE_TIME, pri.UPDATE_TIME, sitem.DISPLAY_NAME SYS_ITEM_DISPLAY_NAME
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_ITEM_PRICE pri,SYS_ITEM sitem where pri.IS_DELETED = 'N' and pri.SYS_ITEM_ID = sitem.ID
and ( pri.SYS_ITEM_ID like '${searchValue}%' or pri.PAY_GROUP like '${searchValue}%' or sitem.DISPLAY_NAME like '%${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_ITEM_PRICE (ID, SYS_ITEM_ID, PAY_TYPE, UNIT_TYPE, COST, UNIT, IS_TARGET, PAY_GROUP, MULTI_TYPE, LEVEL, VIP_LEVEL, TEAM_LEVEL, WEIGHT_RATE, PROBABILITY, IS_DELETED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{multiType,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weightRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{probability,jdbcType=REAL}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

replace into SYS_ITEM_PRICE (ID, SYS_ITEM_ID, PAY_TYPE, UNIT_TYPE, COST, UNIT, IS_TARGET, PAY_GROUP, MULTI_TYPE, LEVEL, VIP_LEVEL, TEAM_LEVEL, WEIGHT_RATE, PROBABILITY, IS_DELETED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.payGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.multiType,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.teamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.weightRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.probability,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID

mapper.update:
update SYS_ITEM_PRICE
SYS_ITEM_ID = #{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COST = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_TARGET = #{isTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAY_GROUP = #{uiType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MULTI_TYPE = #{multiType,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VIP_LEVEL = #{vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TEAM_LEVEL = #{teamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEIGHT_RATE = #{weightRate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROBABILITY = #{probability,jdbcType=REAL},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_ITEM_PRICE set SYS_ITEM_ID = #{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COST = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_TARGET = #{isTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_GROUP = #{payGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MULTI_TYPE = #{multiType,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VIP_LEVEL = #{vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TEAM_LEVEL = #{teamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEIGHT_RATE = #{weightRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROBABILITY = #{probability,jdbcType=REAL}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
